welcome_message_body: Welcome to Amherst, a charming town known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and vibrant arts and culture scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport is the primary hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal primarily used for regional and low-cost carrier flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
